md:
giải nghĩa từ "shouted" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Shouted: ( Verb )
	+ Meaning: to say something loudly and strongly, often in order to be heard by a lot of people.
	+ Vietnamese: la lên, hét lên, kêu lên.
	+ Example: The crowd shouted his name when he walked onto the stage.
	+ Related words: shout, screaming, yelling, crying out.

* Shouted: ( Past tense of shout )
	+ Meaning: said something loudly and strongly.
	+ Vietnamese: đã la lên, đã hét lên, đã kêu lên.
	+ Example: She shouted at him to stop, but he didn't listen.
	+ Related words: shout, screaming, yelling, crying out.

* Shouted: ( Past participle of shout )
	+ Meaning: said something loudly and strongly.
	+ Vietnamese: đã la lên, đã hét lên, đã kêu lên.
	+ Example: The words she shouted at him still echoed in his mind.
	+ Related words: shout, screaming, yelling, crying out.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "shouted" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Shouted: ( Verb )

    • Meaning: to say something loudly and strongly, often in order to be heard by a lot of people.
    • Vietnamese: la lên, hét lên, kêu lên.
    • Example: The crowd shouted his name when he walked onto the stage.
    • Related words: shout, screaming, yelling, crying out.

  • Shouted: ( Past tense of shout )

    • Meaning: said something loudly and strongly.
    • Vietnamese: đã la lên, đã hét lên, đã kêu lên.
    • Example: She shouted at him to stop, but he didn't listen.
    • Related words: shout, screaming, yelling, crying out.

  • Shouted: ( Past participle of shout )

    • Meaning: said something loudly and strongly.
    • Vietnamese: đã la lên, đã hét lên, đã kêu lên.
    • Example: The words she shouted at him still echoed in his mind.
    • Related words: shout, screaming, yelling, crying out.
